body:
To any of you CS:GO players, what do you think of the new update? Do you like the Bowie Knife? Skins in the case?



Do you pray to get an AWP | Medusa or an AWP | Dragonlore from a drop one day?

Also, if you want to add me, my name is DingDeLaDoggo, with a doge picture :)
body_tagged:
To any of you CS:GO players, what do you think of the new update? Do you like the Bowie Knife? Skins in the case?



Do you pray to get an AWP | Medusa or an AWP | Dragonlore from a drop one day?

Also, if you want to add me, my name is DingDeLaDoggo, with a doge picture :)
title: Operation Wildfire

replies.body: Bowie Knife looks sweet, the skins in the case look horrible. Probably the Deagle is the best.
replies.body_tagged: Bowie Knife looks sweet, the skins in the case look horrible. Probably the Deagle is the best.

replies.body: The knife is to big deagle is best but still imma open 25 cases tomorrow lmao
replies.body_tagged: The knife is to big deagle is best but still imma open 25 cases tomorrow lmao

replies.body: I'm just going to wait until the cases are worth 10 cents lol
replies.body_tagged: I'm just going to wait until the cases are worth 10 cents lol

replies.body:
Skins
Deagle: Damn, it looks good
Famas: Looks good too
Awp: Nice, nice
Everything else: oh, ew
Knife: Cool, but very unique enough

Nuke
Haven't played it but it looks cool I guess + rip old toxic

but the new Nuke is awesome, I played it and it's fun.

replies.body:
The new nuke is beautiful, it looks like a different game

The operation is annoying me, I have to wait 15 hours in between doing missions -_-
